pages.text: The $(item)Hellfire Forge$() is one of the core crafting mechanics of $(6)Blood Magic$(), alongside the $(l:altar/bloodaltar)Blood Altar$(/l) itself. Here, you can work with the $(l:demonwill/demonwill)$(item)Demon Will$() you have harvested from mobs, to allow you to create $(l:demonwill/sentienttools)$(item)Sentient Tools$(), including the $(l:demonwill/sentientsword)$(item)Sentient Sword$(), $(l:demonwill/soulgem)$(item)Tartaric Gems$(), various $(item)reagents$(), $(l:alchemyarray/arcaneash)Arcane Ash$(), and many things besides.
